name: goodforms
description: Javascript to validate email addresses, optionally using the paid Goodforms service

scripts.watch: SERVERIP=$(ifconfig en0|grep 'inet '|cut -d ' ' -f 2); echo "SERVERIP IS: $SERVERIP"; rollup -c --watch --environment SNIPPET_ENV:dev --environment SERVERIP:$SERVERIP
scripts.production: SERVERNAME=https://api.goodforms.com rollup -c --environment SNIPPET_ENV:production && uglifyjs --source-map "url='verify.js.map',content=inline" -o dist/verify.js dist/prod-verify.js

author: bwetherington@grokability.com
